name: Lost City (stocktonwoodworth)
description:
Explore the ruins to get an idea of what happened there.

Game requirements:

Chose theme: "Dying planet" - in this case a dying city

Custom model: The custom model appears three times as AI. Each one show cases a different animation from the state machine. One is running, one is idle, and the other is waving.

Polish: Enemies and player character have animations. A day night cycle is featured and the lighting changes accordingly. For different actions taken there is sound from the player character.

Fun/enjoyment: theme is a dying planet, this gam features a dying city. You win if you make it to the final statue and if you run out of health you die. HUD displays health and stamina. If stamina is 0 or less you will be unable to attack or jump until it has recovered a bit.
